pilot_intro: Application is currently in active development and testing stage, companies and professionals interested in early access and estimation in real scenarios are welcome
cookie_consent: Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain
cookie_csrf: Ensures visitor browsing-security by preventing cross-site request forgery. This cookie is essential for the security of the website and visitor
cookie_ui_settings: Stores user interface preferences like language, color mode, and theme settings
cookie_disclaimer: We use cookies to personalize content
SuccessCheckEmail: Success, please check email for confirmation link
ContactUsForEarlyAccessCode: Contact us if you are interested in early access
hero_subtitle: Customizable construction project management system designed to fit organization’s workflow.  Get from concept to a preliminary budget faster than ever before.
tools_pm_desc: Provides basic project management functionality, integrates all the tools and lets you stay in one environment from planning phase to presenting project to the customer
tools_gantt_desc: Interactive Gantt chart that reflects your costs, not just dates, easily visualize tasks and resource allocations on an interactive Gantt chart, review progress and spending on timeline
tools_ai_desc: Describe your goal in natural language. Get a structured breakdown of tasks, materials and labor aligned with norms and classification systems
tools_procurement_desc: Bridge from abstract resources to real-world products and current prices, search and compare offers from multiple suppliers
tools_access_desc: Role-based access control for secure, granular permissions, custom roles tailored to your team structure and responsibilities, workspace customization per role, ensuring each user sees only what is relevant to their work
tools_customization_desc: The platform is plugin-based and extensible, allowing customer-specific views and workflows to be added on request
roadmap_desc: Tools, standards and data sources connected into one cost estimation fabric:
roadmap_basic_desc: Tasks • Gantt • Resources • Files and documents, etc.
